message:

Would someone comment about my design. I'm new to webservices and how it should work. Expect a multithreaded work that the IMapServer should handle multiple requests from the client.
story: Ahmed Saleh shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Designing a WFS service Client

description: The Driver Code that needs to be encapsulated in interfaces is shown next: OGRDataSource *m_wfs_t; m_wfs_t = OGRSFDriverRegistrar::Open("WFS:http://192.168.139.129/cgi-bin/tinyows.exe",tr...
